tool.name: slncky_pipeline
tool.command:
#if str($bedfile) != "": python \$WRAPPERS/slncky_galaxy_wrapper.py --bedfile "$bedfile" #end if
#if str($assembly) != "": --assembly "$assembly" #end if
#if $min_overlap != "": --min_overlap "$min_overlap" #end if
#if str($min_cluster) != "": --min_cluster "$min_cluster" #end if
#if str($min_coding) != "": --min_coding "$min_coding" #end if
#if str($min_noncoding) != "": --min_noncoding "$min_noncoding" #end if
#if str($minMatch) != "": --minMatch "$minMatch" #end if
#if str($pad) != "": --pad "$pad" #end if
#if str($gap_open) != "": --gap_open "$gap_open" #end if
#if str($gap_extend) != "": --gap_extend "$gap_extend" #end if
#if $no_orth_search: "$no_orth_search" #end if
#if $no_filter: "$no_filter" #end if
#if $no_overlap: "$no_overlap" #end if
#if $no_collapse: "$no_collapse" #end if
#if $no_dup: "$no_dup" #end if
#if $no_self: "$no_self" #end if
#if $no_coding: "$no_coding" #end if
#if $no_bg: "$no_bg" #end if
#if $no_orf: "$no_orf" #end if
--grid_system "lsf" --web --html "$html_file" --html_files_path "$html_file.files_path"
--can_lncs "$canonical_to_lncs" --clust_info "$cluster_info" --filt_info "$filtered_info"
--lncs_bed "$lncs" --lncs_info "$lncs_info" --orfs "$orfs" --ortho_top "$orthologs_top" --ortho "$orthologs"

param.name: bedfile
param.label: Bed File:

param.name: assembly
param.label: Assembly:

param.name: no_orth_search
param.label: NO Ortholog Search?
param.help: Only filter; don't search for orthologs.

param.name: no_filter
param.label: Apply NO filter?
param.help: Don't filter; only search for orthologs.

param.name: overwrite
param.label: Force overwrite of trancsripts.lncs.bed?
param.help: Only if you re-run the analysis

param.name: no_overlap
param.label: Remove transcripts that overlap CODING or MAPPED_CODING gene?

param.name: no_collapse
param.label: Collapse overlapping transcripts into single canonical gene?

param.name: no_dup
param.label: Remove transcripts that share sequence similarity with DUP genes?

param.name: no_self
param.label: Remove transcripts sharing sequence similarity with each other?

param.name: no_coding
param.label: Remove transcripts that align to syntenic CODING genes?

param.name: no_bg
param.label: Align to shuffled background?
param.help: Report all alignments. Setting this option will greatly reduce slncky runtime

param.name: no_orf
param.label: Check for conserved ORFs?
param.help: Check for conserved ORFs in aligned noncoding transcripts

param.name: min_overlap
param.label: Remove any transcript that overlap annotated coding gene greater than min_overlap

param.name: min_cluster
param.label: Min size of duplication clusters to remove

param.name: min_coding
param.label: Min exonic identity to filter out transcript that aligns to orthologous coding gene
param.help: default is set by learning coding alignment distribution from data

param.name: min_noncoding
param.label: min exonic identity to filter out transcript that aligns to orthologous noncoding gene

param.name: minMatch
param.label: minMatch parameter for liftover

param.name: pad
param.label: No. of basepairs to search up- and down-stream when lifting over lnc to ortholog

param.name: gap_open
param.label: Gap open penalty to pass to lastz
param.help: Decreasing this parameter will increase sensitivity of orthology search

param.name: gap_extend
param.label: Gap extend penalty to pass to lastz
param.help: Decreasing this parameter will increase sensitivity of orthology search.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**slncky : a tool for lncRNA and ortholog discovery**
For further details please visit
.. class:: warningmark
**Intructions to run:**
Before running the pipeline please take note of the following:-
1) Create a directory for results (Eg: /broad/hptmp/[username]/galaxy_work) and give it 777 permission so Galaxy can write your results in the directory.
- mkdir /broad/hptmp/[username]/galaxy_work
- chmod -R 777 /broad/hptmp/[username]/galaxy_work
